mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bangor Telephone Exchange, exterior
Telephone Building
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Densmore and LeClear (American architectural firm, 1897-1942) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Bangor Telephone Exchange was built in 1931 and is one of several architecturally significant buildings erected in Bangor in the decades following the Great Fire of 1911. The building's dramatic Art Deco style, made it a notable tourist attraction and suitable for a postcard. -- http://www.mainememory.net/artifact/66194 [work]
